about_the_game:
【About the game】

◆ Caution ◆
All in-game text has been translated using machine translation.


◆ Story ◆
The tutor of the main character, Masato, was "the sexually vicious sisters who were childhood friends!"

　The tutor that was given to him by his parents due to his poor grades was the Shinjo sisters.
During the tutoring sessions, the Shinjo sisters use him as an outlet for their stress, and his mind and body deteriorate. mentally and physically.
One day, "Gentildonna," a secret club, and he meets Otomo, the owner of the club.
There, he borrows a hypnosis The hypnosis device he borrows from Otomo involves not only the heroines, but also all the other people involved...

◆Motion Events◆
Some event scenes use motion animation to create a more realistic effect than ever before.
NOTE.
All event scenes do not include motion.

◆Regarding the location of SaveData◆
Save data is created within the Users folder in Windows.
Please perform backups and deletion of save data from the following location.




【Character Introduction】


-The celebrity sister with the best of both worlds - brains, eyes, and the worst of both worlds.

Name: Haruna Shinjyou
Height: 162cm
Three sizes：B110 (K cup)/W64/H92
Characteristics: Esthetics, visiting cafes

　He was a childhood friend of Masato's and for a long time he and his younger sister Serina were together and abused Masato.
They have been estranged recently because they went to college and However, she is now back in Home to marry a rich man.
She has always been a talented woman famous in her hometown for her beautiful appearance and clear mind. When she returns to her hometown, she is asked to tutor him by his mother.
Her crooke nature is not cured even if you go to Tokyo, She takes advantage of her position as a tutor to abuse him to relieve her stress.






A college student with a selfish personality and body.

Name: Serina Shinjyou
Height: 166cm
Three sizes：B105 (J cup)/W61/H88
Characteristics: Physical exercise, travel

　She is a Hruna's younger sister.
Contrary to her brainy older sister, she is not very smart. She is the type of person who goes by the belief, "I will not defy those in power".
She is popular for her beautiful body, which can be seen even on her clothes. She is popular in a different way from her older sister.
She is not as mean-spirited as her older sister, but she is very aggressive towards who clearly looks down on her.
He is not as aggressive as his older sister, but he is very aggressive towards She is not serious about tutoring.



※Japanese voice recording (※male characters are not recorded)


◆ Game Specifications ◆

・Novel game that progresses with a click
・Heroine fully voiced
・CG mode
・Scene recollection


◆ Content Warning ◆
This game includes content that may not be suitable for all ages and may not be appropriate for display in the workplace.
The game contains nudity or sexual content, as well as general adult-oriented content.

These actions can be a crime.

All characters are over 20 years old.

name: Tutor X Hypnosis 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

short_description: The main character is given a hypnosis device. The goal is to hypnotize his sisters, who have been abusing him for a long time, to manipulate them as he wishes and train them to become the women of his choice.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
